atk-s0511a0:4_0: Anantañāṇaṁ karuṇālayaṁ layaṁ, malassa buddhaṁ susamāhitaṁ hitaṁ;
atk-s0511a0:5_0: Namāmi dhammaṁ bhavasaṁvaraṁ varaṁ, guṇākarañceva niraṅgaṇaṁ gaṇaṁ.
atk-s0511a0:6_0: Paññāya seṭṭho jinasāvakānaṁ, yaṁ dhammasenāpati dhammarājaṁ;
atk-s0511a0:20_0: Sotabbarūpaṁ pana buddhavaṁsakathāya aññaṁ idha natthi yasmā;
atk-s0511a0:23_0: Saṁvaṇṇanaṁ vaṇṇayato suvaṇṇaṁ, nidhāya kaṇṇaṁ madhuraṁ suṇātha.
atk-s0511a0:24_0: Sabbampi hitvā pana kiccamaññaṁ, sakkacca maccenidha niccakālaṁ;
atk-s0511a0:25_0: Sotuṁ kathetumpi budhena yuttā, kathā panāyaṁ atidullabhāti.
atk-s0511a0:26_0: Tattha ‘‘buddhavaṁsasaṁvaṇṇanā hessati sārabhūtā’’ti vuttattā buddhavaṁso tāva vavatthapetabbo.
atk-s0511a0:26_2: ito heṭṭhā kappasatasahassādhikesu catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu uppannānaṁ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṁ uppannakappādiparicchedavasena
atk-s0511a0:27_0: Svāyaṁ kappaparicchedo nāmaparicchedo gottaparicchedo jātiparicchedo nagaraparicchedo pituparicchedo
atk-s0511a0:27_4: parinibbānaparicchedoti imehi pāḷiyā āgatehi bāvīsatiyā paricchedehi paricchinno vavatthito.
atk-s0511a0:28_1: So agāravāsaparicchedo pāsādattayaparicchedo nāṭakitthiparicchedo aggamahesiparicchedo puttaparicchedo
atk-s0511a0:28_2: yānaparicchedo abhinikkhamanaparicchedo padhānaparicchedo upaṭṭhākaparicchedo vihāraparicchedoti dasadhā
atk-s0511a0:32_0: Kenāyaṁ desito kattha, kassatthāya ca desito;
atk-s0511a0:33_0: Kimatthāya kadā kassa, vacanaṁ kena cābhato.
atk-s0511a0:36_0: Tattha kenāyaṁ desitoti ayaṁ buddhavaṁso kena desito?
atk-s0511a0:36_1: Sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacārena dasabalena catuvesārajjavisāradena dhammarājena dhammassāminā tathāgatena sabbaññunā sammāsambuddhena desito.
atk-s0511a0:37_1: Kapilavatthumahānagare nigrodhārāmamahāvihāre paramarucirasandassane devamanussanayananipātabhūte ratanacaṅkame caṅkamantena desito.
atk-s0511a0:38_0: Kassatthāyaca desitoti? Dvāsītiyā ñātisahassānaṁ anekakoṭīnañca devamanussānaṁ atthāya desito.
atk-s0511a0:40_0: Kadā desitoti bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṁ vīsativassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṁ hoti,
atk-s0511a0:40_2: Paṭhamaṁ vassaṁ isipatane dhammacakkaṁ (saṁ. ni. 5.1081; mahāva. 13 ādayo; paṭi. ma.
atk-s0511a0:40_3: 2.30) pavattetvā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṁ pāyetvā bārāṇasiṁ upanissāya isipatane migadāye vasi.
atk-s0511a0:40_4: Dutiyaṁ vassaṁ rājagahaṁ upanissāya veḷuvane mahāvihāre.
atk-s0511a0:40_17: Soḷasamaṁ āḷavakaṁ dametvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni amatapānaṁ pāyetvā āḷaviyaṁ.
atk-s0511a0:40_20: Tathā ekūnavīsatimaṁ vīsatimaṁ pana vassaṁ rājagaheyeva vasi.
atk-s0511a0:40_22: ‘‘bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṁ vīsativassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṁ hoti,
atk-s0511a0:40_24: Tato paṭṭhāya pana sāvatthiṁyeva upanissāya jetavanamahāvihāre ca pubbārāme ca dhuvaparibhogavasena vasi.
atk-s0511a0:41_0: Yadā pana satthā buddho hutvā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye paṭhamaṁ vassaṁ vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā
atk-s0511a0:41_1: uruvelaṁ gantvā tattha tayo māse vasanto tebhātikajaṭile dametvā bhikkhusahassehi kataparivāro phussamāsapuṇṇamāyaṁ
atk-s0511a0:41_2: rājagahaṁ gantvā dve māse tattheva vasi,
atk-s0511a0:41_3: tadā bārāṇasito nikkhantassa panassa pañca māsā jātā.
atk-s0511a0:41_10: So evaṁ cintetvā kulanagaragamanatthāya saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi gamanavaṇṇaṁ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0511a0:41_11: Atha satthā cassa vacanaṁ sutvā ñātisaṅgahaṁ kātukāmo hutvā aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṁ kulaputtānaṁ dasahi sahassehi
atk-s0511a0:41_12: kapilavatthuvāsīnaṁ dasahi sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatiyā khīṇāsavasahassehi parivuto rājagahato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a0:41_13: divase divase yojanaṁ gacchanto rājagahato saṭṭhiyojanaṁ kapilavatthupuraṁ dvīhi māsehi sampāpuṇitvā
atk-s0511a0:42_0: Kassa vacananti? Sāvakapaccekabuddhānaṁ asādhāraṇaṁ sammāsambuddhasseva vacanaṁ.
atk-s0511a0:43_2: Ayañhi sāriputtatthero bhaddajī tisso kosiyaputto siggavo moggaliputto sudatto dhammiko dāsako soṇako
atk-s0511a0:43_4: tato uddhampi tesaṁyeva sissānusissehīti evaṁ tāva ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjakālā ābhatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0511a0:46_0: Kimatthāya kadā kassa, vacanaṁ kena cābhato’’ti. –
atk-s0511a0:50_0: Evaṁ ābhatassa panassa idāni atthavaṇṇanā hoti,
atk-s0511a0:50_1: sā panāyaṁ atthavaṇṇanā yasmā dūrenidānaṁ avidūrenidānaṁ santikenidānanti,
atk-s0511a0:50_2: imāni tīṇi nidānāni dassetvāva vaṇṇitā suvaṇṇitā nāma hoti.
atk-s0511a0:50_4: tehi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya viññātattā suviññātāva hoti,
atk-s0511a0:51_0: Tattha ādito paṭṭhāya tāva tesaṁ nidānānaṁ paricchedo veditabbo.
atk-s0511a0:51_2: dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle katābhinīhārassa mahāsattassa yāva vessantarattabhāvā cavitvā tusitabhavane nibbatti,
atk-s0511a0:51_6: ‘‘Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme’’ti ca,
atk-s0511a0:51_8: ‘‘vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāya’’nti ca evaṁ mahābodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇappattito yāva
atk-s0511a0:51_9: parinibbānamañcā etasmiṁ antare bhagavā yattha yattha vihāsi,
atk-s0511a0:51_11: Ettāvatā saṅkhepeneva tiṇṇaṁ dūrāvidūrasantikenidānānaṁ vasena bāhiranidānavaṇṇanā samattā hotīti.
